fields.description: When the number of tabs increases, you automatically get a "more" tab. The customer wants to set title image on the 'more' tab. Right now he can only set the text property.
fields.summary: iOS: Allow users to set image title on "more" tab in tabview group

Titanium SDK: Mobile 1.8.0.1
Platform OS: iOS
Platform OS Version: 5.0
